v8:item.v8:content: Compliance with legislation of the Russian Federation

Shows the compliance with Federal Law of the Russian Federation No. 63-FZ "On electronic signatures" as of April 6, 2011. It is recommended that you use signature key qualified certificates (SKQS) that comply with 63-FZ.
Existence of certificate on the server picture
Certificate is available in the Personal list

Shows whether the certificate is added to the Personal store on the computer. For signing and decryption to be possible, the certificate must be installed in the Personal store and associated with the private key.

Shows the result of the certificate data check using a digital signing and encryption app.
Certificate data imported from a certificate file or using another method might be incorrect due to several reasons. These are the most frequent ones: - The certificate has expired. - The certificate is in the list of revoked certificates.
Presence of a signing and decryption app
Shows whether the app specified in the certificate for the private key is installed on the computer. The app allows you to sign and decrypt data.
Shows whether it is possible to sign data with the certificate private key using a digital signing and encryption app. Password required.
Shows whether the signature can be checked with the certificate public key using a digital signing and encryption app.
Shows whether data can be encrypted with the certificate public key using a digital signing and encryption app.
Shows whether it is possible to sign data with the certificate private key using a digital signing and encryption app. Password required.
To perform checks, enter the password (if it is set)
Remember the certificate password before closing the app. When the check box is cleared, the stored password will be forgotten.
Click Check to start entering the password.

Facing issues? Learn how to <link %1>troubleshoot digital signing apps</> (in Russian).
If you didn't find a solution, contact the 1C support team and provide <link %2>technical information</> about the issue.
